item.title: Pope Leo's religious community is drawing renewed interest. Here's what makes it unique
item.description: "Before, we might get two or three discerners. But after Pope Leo, I now have 15. It's unbelievable."

item.title: Israel intercepts aid flotilla headed for Gaza
item.description: As Israel intercepted the aid ships, an airstrike also killed at least one aid worker in Gaza.
